name: Python FastAPI Best Practices
description: Modern async Python API with FastAPI and Pydantic
rules: Use Pydantic models for all request/response schemas with proper validation
Implement async/await for all I/O operations (database, HTTP, file)
Use type hints for all function parameters and return types
Follow PEP 8 style guide with Black formatter and Ruff linter
Structure with routers, dependencies, and service layers
Implement dependency injection for database sessions and auth
Use SQLAlchemy 2.0 async syntax for database operations
Document all endpoints with proper docstrings and OpenAPI examples
Implement comprehensive error handling with HTTPException
Use environment variables with pydantic-settings for configuration
